entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Blanc-Sablon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:04 PM AST Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Blanc-Sablon Airport 03:00 AM AST Sunday 19 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -3.0°C
Wind: E 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Saturday 18 March 2023
